name: TCC
startIntroPart1: 'When the Cataclysm happened, there were many that felt lost. Like the world was too far gone. I always had hope, but sometimes it's hard to keep it. Ever since we came out, the world has felt like a jungle. Ruled by wild beasts.'
startIntroPart2: 'But I got lucky. I found my platoon. My family. I think people seem to forget it, but fundamental rights? Democracy? Those were the result of natural progress. Of us seeing what worked, and what didnt. And as long as we keep marching backwards like this, we will never be better. The world had given me a second chance. And so I give you one as well. We go around the world gathering people like us. That see the world not for what it. But for what it can be. A New Star.'
declaringWar: History has told us war is usually not the way to go. But in these urgent times there can be an exception
attacked: The counters deem you ready to become history
Your ignorance has lead you to repeat history again. I hope it won't end the same way again.
defeated: Without us and our memories in place, no one will prevent the world from making the same mistakes as before. No one will warn them as history repeats itself
introduction: Welcome stranger of the new world, come have a talk with me. Enjoy the few words, as you will likely not here from me again. I am one of the people upholding the unfortunate remains of old history who record everything they see even to this day.
neutralHello: Hello representative of a new nation. Please tell me all details of your
hateHello: Please speak fast when stating your intentions, I don't want to waste too much time on you
You shouldn't show up in a civilized place like this.
tradeRequest: The Counters have already calculated the benefits of this offer. Please keep in mind this conversation has never happened.
uniques: Receive a free Great Person at the end of every [Count Cycle] (every 394 years), after researching [Restart the Count]. Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
Once The Long Count activates, the year on the world screen displays as the traditional Mayan Long Count.
[-50]% Great Person generation [in all cities] <before the [Industrial era]>

name: Cyberapes
startIntroPart1: 'When the Cataclysm happened, there were many that felt lost. Like the world was too far gone. I always had hope, but sometimes it's hard to keep it. Ever since we came out, the world has felt like a jungle. Ruled by wild beasts.'
startIntroPart2: 'But I got lucky. I found my platoon. My family. I think people seem to forget it, but fundamental rights? Democracy? Those were the result of natural progress. Of us seeing what worked, and what didnt. And as long as we keep marching backwards like this, we will never be better. The world had given me a second chance. And so I give you one as well. We go around the world gathering people like us. That see the world not for what it. But for what it can be. A New Star.'
declaringWar: Let's wipe out your puny race.
defeated: Guess you were not supposed to have fun in a wasteland. The world is an even worse place now.
introduction: Welcome to the new jungle, new face. Let this wasteland not be a new struggle, but rather a second chance. We love this world and you should do the same.
hateHello: Just wanna let you know we don't like your folks.
tradeRequest: The society of Apes brings forth this generous offer.
uniques: Upon capturing a city, receive [3] times its [Culture] production as [Culture] immediately
Gain [45] Influence with a [Kids Care Monkey] gift to a City-State
Production to [Culture] conversion in cities changed by [+100]%
Production to [Faith] conversion in cities changed by [+100]%

name: Exploiters Tribe
uniques: [+2 Food, +4 Production] from every [Camp] <before the [Neofeudal era]>
[+2 Production] from every [Camp] <starting from the [Neofeudal era]> <before the [Industrial era]>
[+1 Production, -1 Food] from every [Camp] <starting from the [Industrial era]>
[-50]% growth [in all cities] <starting from the [Industrial era]>
[-50]% Yield from every [Food source] <starting from the [Industrial era]>
declaringWar: How cares about renewability? We will exploit your people!
defeated: Well, we had our fun. Now it's your turn depleting the leftovers

name: The Mechanized
startIntroPart1: 'When the Cataclysm happened, there were many that felt lost. Like the world was too far gone. I always had hope, but sometimes it's hard to keep it. Ever since we came out, the world has felt like a jungle. Ruled by wild beasts.'
startIntroPart2: 'But I got lucky. I found my platoon. My family. I think people seem to forget it, but fundamental rights? Democracy? Those were the result of natural progress. Of us seeing what worked, and what didnt. And as long as we keep marching backwards like this, we will never be better. The world had given me a second chance. And so I give you one as well. We go around the world gathering people like us. That see the world not for what it. But for what it can be. A New Star.'
declaringWar: *weep* Intruders to our desired place *weep* Die inferior! *weep*
attacked: The machines will crunch you. Your body will end in a feeding lab
defeated: The life of us began in a lab and sadly it will end there. My people will decay not knowing I will remain. Fractured and Powerless. This is not the future I desired for my new life. I guess humanity was never inferior.
introduction: Hello Humanborn. Do you posess the interest of shaking hands with a living machina?
hateHello: *Im not gonna answer inferior beings like you*
tradeRequest: The Artificial Intelligence has come up with this offer. It will surely be well thought of
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Will not be chosen for new games
Cannot grow cities naturally with Food
Can artificially create people with unique buildings
Cannot build [All] units <in cities without a [Life Creation Lab]>
[+1] population [in all cities connected to capital] <upon entering a Golden Age> <after adopting [Mechanization Complete]>
